snippet.title: BLOCK QUAKE - available now!
snippet.description:
► Beginner friendly   ITCH.IO   https://kebby-quake.itch.io/block-quake

► Experienced modders   GITHUB   https://github.com/Kebby-Quake/block-quake

► For mod updates and block talk   DISCORD   https://discord.gg/McUS8WnrvE

------------------------------------------------------------------
♫ Music by mikedm92 https://ocremix.org/remix/OCR03860
♪ Thanks to OverClocked ReMix https://ocremix.org/
------------------------------------------------------------------

UPDATED:  Compatible with Copper mod!

Block Quake is a total conversion mod for Quake featuring familiar plastic blocks.  There are still lots of features I'd like to include in this mod, but oh well, here's the big public release!  I know I haven't been posting as many videos, I've been very busy, but expect more stuff in the future, it'll get here eventually!  Stay tuned for some Remastered gameplay videos.

For other projects, I really want to organize my older experimental mods and get them uploaded to GitHub for people to mess around with.  I'm not completely finished with Block Quake yet, I have plans to create a colorful Blocky-WAD for mappers and an "extra goodies" version with custom changes to the source code for new special effects and gameplay events (eventually!)  If you're interested in some Blocky-themed maps, or want to "talk block", come join our discord (link above)  I hope you'll enjoy it and thanks for reading!  -Kebby_
